name: Lasse Natvig
content: Lasse Natvig - NTNU Lasse Natvig Download press photo Download press photo Foto: Close Lasse Natvig Professor, PhD Department of Computer Science Faculty of Information Technology and Electrical Engineering lasse.natvig@ntnu.no +4773593685 +4790644580 IT-bygget, rom 404, Gløshaugen. Twitter NTNU - EECS Comp.arch lab About Research interests: Computer architecture, parallel processing, multi-core architectures and programming, chip multiprocessors and their memory systems, green computing, performance evaluation, energy-efficient computing and C++ programming.
